programme.title: People You May Know
programme.desc: People You May Know follows Jed, a 30-something introvert who has managed to abstain from social media until now. When prompted with the gargantuan task of defining who he is, he realizes the life he can fake is much more interesting than the life he actually leads.

programme.title: The Good Girl
programme.desc: A discount store clerk strikes up an affair with a stock boy who considers himself the incarnation of Holden Caulfield.Justine is a sullen 30-year-old woman stuck in a dead-end job at the Retail Rodeo department store.In addition to her mind-numbing occupation, Justine also has to contend with her dim-witted husband, Phil, and his partner, Bubba, who work as house painters when they arent smoking pot and staring blankly at the television.Justine sees an opportunity for change, however, when she meets Holden, a fellow Retail Rodeo employee who is even more depressed than herself.The young Holden and Justine soon begin a passionate secret affair, unaware that it may not be so secret after all.

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: Spooner
programme.desc: Facing eviction from his parents home on his 30th birthday, a socially awkward guy meets the girl of his dreams and creates his own rules for growing up.

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Unknown Energies, Unidentified Emotions
programme.desc: A hybrid of animated, experimental, feature and genre film in found footage technique, with a radio phonic sound and of unexpected, almost 40-minute duration. Journalist Isidor Dukas visits the Institute for Research on Psychic Phenomena and Mental Film when a confrontation with one of the test subjects transforms a routine check into a never-ending maze. Barićs work calls into question issues surrounding artistic practices in the digital age including ideas about authenticity, simulation/replication and appropriation.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. Uneducated, she relies on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: In 1941 China under the Japanese rule, Ma Yuan is forced to work in railroad construction used for transferring Japanese equipment. He decides together with a team of rebels to sabotage a military train with heavy weaponry.

programme.title: Con Man
programme.desc: The story of Barry Minkow, a young charismatic business man who becomes a wealthy CEO by lying, cheating and stealing his way to the top.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Three friends - a reporter, an oil analyst and a financial executive - reunite after ten years and accidentally uncover one of the key, hidden reasons for what motivated the war in Iraq. The trio struggles to present evidence to major media that America invaded Iraq to force oil sales from the Euro back to the Dollar to preserve US global monetary supremacy. Against incredible odds, the team must face their pasts, find willing sources to corroborate the story, and survive the conspirators as they push to bring the truth to light.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
programme.desc: David Lowerys crime biopic stars Robert Redford as Forrest Tucker, a real-life bank robber who found himself wanted by police across the United States for a string of prison escapes and robberies. We first meet Tucker in the early 80s. Hes 74 and has been evading police for two years since his last audacious prison break. But hes not taking things easy and laying low. Thats not his bag. This suave old geezer has a somehow enamouring way of walking into a bank, charmingly informing the teller that he has a gun that he doesnt want to use, and walking out with a big old sack of cash. In fact, hes just done exactly that when he meets Jewel (Sissy Spacek), an enchanting farmer who he quickly trusts so much that he decides to reveal to her his true identity. Tucker, alongside spending time on Jewels farm enjoying her more simplistic way of life, embarks on a string of heists. On the case is local detective John Hunt (Casey Affleck), and Tucker soon finds himself torn between the peaceful life hes enjoyed with Jewel and his old criminal ways. Also starring Danny Glover and Tom Waits.

programme.title: Looks That Kill
programme.desc: This is the story of sixteen-year-old Max as he deals with the ups and downs of being lethally attractive.

programme.title: Black Cop
programme.desc: A black police officer gets pushed to the edge after he is profiled and assaulted by the colleagues he worked side by side with, so he decides to get revenge and take his frustrations out on the community that he swore to protect.

programme.title: American Traitor
programme.desc: Based on a true story. Eccentric, brilliant lawyer James Laughlin (Al Pacino) boldly accepts the case to defend American entertainer Mildred Gillars (Meadow Williams) from ten counts of treason charged by the US government regardless of the inevitable backlash from his country. During WWII, Mildred became a powerful weapon in the hands of the Nazis and was forced to sing defeatist war propaganda to US soldiers based in Europe. Terrorized and raped by Joseph Goebbels, Hitlers right-hand man, Mildred broadcasts hate-filled messages in order to survive the dark and dangerous world of the Third Reich. Despite attempting to murder Goebbels, Mildred is eventually captured by American authorities and sent to trial where, against all odds, Laughlin struggles to redeem her reputation and maintain his own.

programme.title: Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: In 2008, rookie journalist Jay Bahadur forms a half-baked plan to embed himself among the pirates of Somalia. He ultimately succeeds in providing the first close-up look into who these men are, how they live, and the forces that drive them.

programme.title: Deserter
programme.desc: Unlikely friends in a melting pot of confusion. Simon Murray fights for the French Foreign Legion. Pascal Dupont fights for himself. War torn men question honour, hope, morality...because you can desert everything...except yourself.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old York Hayes, leader of the Fire Dragon Scout Troops, returns to Camp Rahuta for his final scout camp. York has decided to take the best step of his life.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: Parancs nelkul
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Corner Office
programme.desc: As Orson, The Authoritys newest employee, finds himself trapped in the absurdities of corporate life, his alienation deepens when he discovers a room hes told doesnt exist.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: Donald P. Sinclair has placed six separate gold coins in different slot machines in his casino. The lucky six who find these coins discover an opportunity of a lifetime. The chance to own $2 million. Locked up in a locker in New Mexico, these six contestants must now race each other, to be the first to the cash. There are no rules in place and everything that could possibly happen, does. Whilst, behind the scenes, Sinclairs associates are placing their bets.

programme.title: The Groomsmen
programme.desc: A 30-something man decides to marry his pregnant girlfriend and asks his four best friends to stand with him at the wedding, but as he observes his friends relationship troubles, he wrestles with issues of fatherhood, marriage and growing up.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: A man steps out of a park fountain in Ho Chi Minh City with no recollection of who he is or where he came from. As he wanders through the city, piecing together clues to his past, he is relentlessly pursued by mysterious figures.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones and Samuel L. Jackson star in this riveting saga of a veteran Marine who becomes the scapegoat for a mission that went tragically wrong. Faced with murder charges in a case thats been rigged against him, Col. Terry Childers (Jackson) turns to a former brother-in-arms (Jones) to defend him and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Berkeley
programme.desc: Berkeley is the story of Ben Sweet, an eighteen year old boy who comes to UC Berkeley in 1968 to study accounting and avoid the draft. There begins an odyssey through sex, drugs, rock and roll, and political activism which turns his world upside down and leaves him on a path of exploration and self-discovery, far from the life of his father, Sy Sweet. The film depicts a group of young people protesting the Vietnam War.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: Mystery movie. American mystery, produced in 2017. Retired homicide detective Ray Archer and his partner, ex FBI agent Will Ruiney, are assigned to track down a vicious serial killer, who is playing a twisted version of the childrens game Hangman.

programme.title: Laipni lūgti Zombijzemē!
programme.desc: Kautrīgs students, kurš mēģina sazināties savu ģimeni Ohaio štatā, ar ieroci staigājošs tēls, meklējot pēdējo Tvinkiju un pāris māsu, kas cenšas nokļūt atrakciju parkā, apvieno spēkus pārgājienā pa zombiju pilno Ameriku.

programme.title: Es gribu tevi atpakaļ
programme.desc: Pīters un Emma iepazinās brīdī, kad abus vienoja līdzīgas bēdas - viņus bija pametušas viņu dzīves mīlestības. Sagrauti un sāpināti viņi nolemj to tā neatstāt - viņi taču var izjaukt savu bijušo jaunās attiecības! Viņi apvieno spēkus, lai viens otram palīdzētu, taču asprātīgajam plānam izrādās negaidīts iznākums. Galvenajās lomās: Čārlijs Dejs, Dženija Sleita, Skots Īstvuds

programme.desc: Pastaiga ziemas brīnumzemē

programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Laipni lūgti Zombijzemē!
programme.desc: Kautrīgs students, kurš mēģina sazināties savu ģimeni Ohaio štatā, ar ieroci staigājošs tēls, meklējot pēdējo Tvinkiju un pāris māsu, kas cenšas nokļūt atrakciju parkā, apvieno spēkus pārgājienā pa zombiju pilno Ameriku.

programme.title: Non-Stop: tiešais reiss
programme.desc: Transatlantiskā avioreisa Ņujorka_Londona laikā ASV aviācijas policijas priekšnieks Bils Marks saņem vairākas īsziņas ar prasību pārskaitīt 150 miljonus dolāru uz kādu ārzonu kontu. Pretējā gadījumā tiek draudēts ik pēc 20 minūtēm nogalināt kādu pasažieri. Kad atklājas, ka konts ir atvērts uz paša Marka vārda, viņš tiek turēts aizdomās par lidmašīnas nolaupīšanu.

programme.title: Bezmiegs Sietlā
programme.desc: Nesen par atraitni kļuvuša vīrieša dēls piezvana uz radio sarunu šovu, mēģinot savam tēvam atrast jaunu partneri.

programme.title: Avārijas nosēšanās
programme.desc: Veicot riskantu nolaišanos kara plosītā salā, pilots Broudijs Torenss izglābj pasažierus no zibens spēriena, bet izdzīvošana, veiksmīgi piezemējoties, ir tikai sākums. Kad lielāko daļu pasažieru gūstā saņem bīstami separātisti, vienīgais, uz kura palīdzību Torenss var paļauties, ir slepkavībā apsūdzētais Luiss Gaspārs, kuru aizturējis FIB. Lai glābtu pasažierus, Torensam vajadzīga Gaspāra palīdzība, un viņš par sabiedroto uzzinās vairāk, nekā redzams no malas.

programme.title: Kreilis
programme.desc: Billija Houpa dzīvē viss bija nevainojami - čempiona tituls, skaista sieva un mīļotā meitiņa. Taču vienā brīdī viss apgriežas ar kājām gaisā - traģiskos apstākļos iet bojā viņa sieva, diskvalifikācija ringā, pēc kuras viņu pamet menedžeris, nekādu ienākumu un viņam tiek atņemtas vecāka tiesības. Lai atgūtu visu, kas Billijam ir bijis dārgs, viņam ir jaatrod spēki uzvarēt sava mūža grūtākajā...

programme.title: Ultraamerikāņi
programme.desc: Maiks strādā benzīna uzpildes stacijā un samērā bezmērķīgi pavada savu dzīvi, veltīdams daudz laika zālītes pīpēšanai kopā ar savu draudzeni Fību. Taču negaidīti atklājas, ka Maiks ir īpaši trenēts un ļoti nāvējošs slepenais aģents. Līdz šim nemaz nenojautis par saviem neparastajiem talantiem, Maiks tiek ierauts bīstamā valdības specdienestu spēlē, kurā jaunizceptajam varonim ir jāpieliek visi pūliņi, lai izdzīvotu.

programme.title: 127 Stundas
programme.desc: Filma "127 stundas" balstīta uz patiesiem notikumiem par alpīnistu Āronu Ralstonu, kuru filmā spēlē aktieris Džeimss Franko. Stāsts risinās pēc negadījuma Jūtas štata kanjonos, kad Āronu klinšu aizā iesprosto klintsbluķis, piespiežot viņa roku pret akmens sienu. Turpmākās piecas dienas jeb 127 stundas alpīnists cīnās par dzīvību un ir spiests pieņemt izmisīgu, taču drosmīgu lēmumu, nozāģējot savu roku, kas ir viņa vienīgā iespēja palikt dzīvam.

programme.title: Apokalipto
programme.desc: Maiju valstībai piedzīvojot tās norietu, jauns vīrietis dodas bīstamā ceļojumā uz pasauli, kurā valda bailes un apspiešana.

programme.title: Ultraamerikāņi

programme.title: Altamira
programme.desc: Dzīve un notikumi kāda vīrieša ikdienā, atklājot vienu no 19. gadsimta būtiskākajiem atklājumiem - Altamiras alas.

programme.title: Manis te nav
programme.desc: Kāds vīrietis cīnās ar traģiskām pagātnes atmiņām, cenšoties izprast savu tagadni. Tomēr drīz vien viņš apjauš, ka laiks nav tāds ienaidnieks, par kādu viņš to uzskata.

programme.title: Altamira
programme.desc: Dzīve un notikumi kāda vīrieša ikdienā, atklājot vienu no 19. gadsimta būtiskākajiem atklājumiem - Altamiras alas.

programme.title: Ofēlija
programme.desc: Filmā "Ofēlija", kas veidota pēc Lisas Klainas romāna, Ofēlija, slavenā Šekspīra lugas "Hamlets" varone, vēsta savu versiju par to, kā patiesībā risinājās lugā aprakstītie notikumi. Ofēliju, dumpīgo, bez mātes augušo meiteni, pieņem audzināšanā karaliene Ģertrūde. Viņā iemīlas Ģertrūdes dēls princis Hamlets, un viņi slepus apprecas laikā, kad Dānijas karaļvalsti apdraud norvēģu iebrukums un galma iekšienē vērptās intrigas. Ofēlijai un Hamletam ir jāizvēlas starp mīlestību un atriebības alkām.

programme.title: Aklais randiņš
programme.desc: Vientuļam vīrietim, kurš savā dzīvoklī alkst miera un klusuma, idilli iztraucē viņa jaunā kaimiņiene, klavierspēlētāja. Kamēr viņi humoristiski cenšas apnikt viens otram, neapmierinātība pārvēršas draudzībā un daudz vairāk.

programme.title: Simtgadnieks, kas izkāpa pa logu un pazuda
programme.desc: Sirmgalvis vārdā Alans simtajā dzimšanas dienā nolemj mainīt dzīvi. Kamēr sveicēji gatavo ziedus un torti, viņš sakravā čemodānu, izkāpj pa logu un pazūd no pansionāta. Nevilšus piesavinājies narkotiku tirgoņu koferi, pilnu ar naudu, viņš uzsāk savu aizraujošāko dzīves piedzīvojumu. Filma ir uzņemta pēc pasaulē slavenā romāna ar tādu pašu nosaukumu. Alanam Karlsonam šis neparastais piedzīvojums nav pirmais. Gadsimta laikā viņš ir vakariņojis ar ASV prezidentu Hariju Trūmenu, ceļojis ar auto kopā ar Vinstonu Čērčilu, devies kruīzā kopā ar Mao Dzeduna sievu, kājām apgājis Himalajus un palīdzējis PSRS tikt pie atombumbas. Filmas režisors un scenārija autors ir pazīstamais zviedru režisors un producents Fēliks Harngrēns.

programme.title: Meitene miglā
programme.desc: Krimināltrilleris, Francija, Vācija, Itālija, 2017. / Režisors: Donato Karīzi / Lomās: Tonijs Servilo, Žans Reno, Alesio Boni, Galateja Ranci. Kādā aukstā ziemas naktī psihiatru Augusto Floresu steidzami izsauc uz darbu, lai izmeklētu avārijā nonākušo policijas inspektoru Fogelu. Inspektors neko neatceras, notikuma vietā nekas nenorāda uz avārijas iemeslu un tās upuriem. Tomēr Fogela krekls ir ar svaigiem asins traipiem un asinis nav viņa. Sarunas laikā sāk izgaismoties neticamu, pirms mēneša sākušos, notikumu virkne.

programme.title: Puisis
programme.desc: Jauns žurnālists Gotjērs uzzinājis, ka viņš ir franču popdziedātāja Gaja Džemeta ārlaulības dēls. Kamēr veco laiku zvaigzne dodas tūrē, lai reklamētu savu jauno albumu, Gotjērs nolemj sekot viņam aizkulisēs, uz skatuves un ceļā. Viņa iegansts - viņš it kā filmē dokumentālo filmu par mūziķa karjeru.

programme.title: Hičkoks
programme.desc: Būdams jau populārs un pieprasīts režisors, Alfrēds Hičkoks ļaujas pārdrošam eksperimentam - lielbudžeta filmu vietā uzņemt ļoti pieticīgu, melnbaltu trilleri "Psiho". Negūstot atbalstu no studijas puses, Hičkoks nolemj pats finansēt savu filmu. Kopā ar savu sievu un asistenti Almu Revilu, režisors dodas cilvēka dvēseles tumšāko bezdibeņu pētījumos, lai atrasto tos nervu galus, uz kuriem kā klavieres taustiņiem, meistars varētu nospēlēt skatītāju emocijās īstenu šausmu simfoniju.

programme.title: Visa pasaules nauda
programme.desc: Kad sešpadsmitgadīgais Džons Pols Getijs III tiek nolaupīts, viņa izmisusī māte Geila lūdz jaunekļa vectēvu, naftas magnātu, samaksāt izpirkumu. Kad miljardieris Getijs atsakās, Geila visiem spēkiem mēģina viņu pārliecināt, jo dēla nolaupītāji kļūst arvien brutālāki. Kamēr zēna dzīvība karājas mata galā, negaidīti par Geilas sabiedroto šajā cīņā kļūst Getija konsultants Flečers Čeiss, bijušais CIP darbinieks.

programme.title: Puisis
programme.desc: Jauns žurnālists Gotjērs uzzinājis, ka viņš ir franču popdziedātāja Gaja Džemeta ārlaulības dēls. Kamēr veco laiku zvaigzne dodas tūrē, lai reklamētu savu jauno albumu, Gotjērs nolemj sekot viņam aizkulisēs, uz skatuves un ceļā. Viņa iegansts - viņš it kā filmē dokumentālo filmu par mūziķa karjeru.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship
programme.desc: Eight bakers show off their skills in this Holiday-themed baking competition series with the winner taking home a whopping $50,000. With three expert judges analysing their baked treats, every mistake is identified, so these eight bakers must whip, cream, and ice to perfection if they hope to progress to the final rounds of the competition. The challenges are of course Holiday-themed, thus testing their creativity and ability to adapt. Each episode is comprised of two rounds, with the worst performing baker eliminated every week until only one remains.

programme.title: Christmas Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Reality competition for the festive period. A group of talented bakers hope to impress the judges with their Christmas cookies as they face a series of themed challenges. The judges will be looking for inventiveness, decorating skills and, of course, deliciously baked Christmas cookies. Whoever can wow the judges and blow away the competition will take home a huge cash prize.

programme.title: Best Bite In Town
programme.desc: Clarksville. Noah Cappe and chefs Jet Tila and Tiffani Faison explore the food scene in Clarksville, Tennessee. There, they sample pizza, pasta, BBQ, and cheesecake.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Chopped

Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Kids Sweets Showdown
programme.desc: Nearly all kids love to eat sweet treats, but how many can make them? In this cooking competition series hosted by Alisson Sweeney, Sharone Hakman and Harley Morenstein, young bakers are invited to showcase their culinary talents for a slice of a hefty $10,000 cash prize. Two pairs of kids go head to head in a primary baking competition, whilst there are also "sugar rush" challenges, where the young bakers have a limited amount of time to create something delicious. Each of the dishes are judged and scored, with the best performing duo taking home the cash.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Selena + Restaurant
programme.desc: Selena Gomez feels the pressure at Alta, Keith Corbins California restaurant. Later, she makes a fried fish dish for Atlas toughest critic, Renee Corbin.

programme.title: Santas Baking Blizzard
programme.desc: Combining edibility and artistry, Americas best bakers team up with expert ice sculptors to create phenomenal Christmas-themed cakes. Hosted by Casey Webb, who presents each episodes teams with their tricky challenges, the series pushes these bakers talents to the limit, as each team hopes to impress the judges and move on to the finale, where a whopping $25,000 is up for grabs.

programme.title: Ciao House
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 6. Hosts Alex Guarnaschelli and Gabe Bertaccini welcome ten chefs to the Tuscan villa where they will live, cook and prove their skills with Italian cuisine.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Chopped

The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Jos Faves. Joanna shares her all-time favourite recipes, including Chicken Cordon Bleu, Gruyere Potato Casserole, and Arugula and Dried Cherry Salad.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Mexican Cuisine. Joanna shares her recipes for spinach enchiladas with a side of Mexican rice and charro beans, queso blanco, fresh tomato salsa and churro cookies.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: Новости: a news report from Ukraine with details of the latest national and international stories.

programme.title: Pēdējais elpas vilciens
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par dziļjūras nirējiem, kas cīnās, lai izglābtu savu komandas biedru, iesprostotu desmitiem metru zem okeāna virsmas.

programme.title: Zudušajās zemēs
programme.desc: Karaliene sūta vareno un bīstamo burvi Greju Alisu uz rēgainajiem Zudušo Zemes mežonīgajiem plašumiem meklēt maģisku spēku, kur burvei un viņas pavadonim, klejotājam Boisam, jāapspēlē un jāpārspēj gan cilvēki, gan dēmoni.

programme.title: Killera sievas miesassargs
programme.desc: Miesassargs Maikls Braiss beidzot var atviegloti uzelpot. Trakais killers Dariuss Kinkeids, kurš piebeidzis veselu baru ļaužu visā pasaulē, nu ir nozudis. Saule, mīļākā grāmata un ne domas par Kinkeidu – ko gan vēl varētu vēlēties, lai atgūtu formu. Taču tad pludmalē uzrodas līdz matu galiem apbruņotā Kinkeida sieva Sonja, un viņai ir sliktas ziņas – Kinkeids ir Itālijā, viņu nolaupījuši teroristi un tie ir jāiznīcina!

programme.title: Eilīna
programme.desc: Eilīna strādā zēnu pāraudzināšanas iestādē. Kad kolektīvam pievienojas jauna psiholoģe, Eilīnai ar viņu rodas īpašs kontakts. Bet viņu attiecības pavisam drīz uzņem grēcīgu pavērsienu.

programme.title: Bada garša
programme.desc: Kāds pāris ziedo visu, tikai lai saņemtu visaugstāko atzinību pavārmākslas pasaulē — Michelin zvaigzni.

programme.title: Bridžita Džounsa: Kā traka pēc viņa
programme.desc: Bridžita atkal ir viena un audzina 9 gadus veco Billiju un 4 gadus veco Meibelu. Iestrēgusi emocionālā nestabilitātē, viņa audzina bērnus ar uzticīgā drauga un bijušā mīļākā Daniela Klīvera palīdzību. Taču tad viņas dzīvē negaidīti uzrodas vēl kāds vīrietis.

programme.title: Palaidnīgā feja
programme.desc: 337 gadus jaunajai zobu fejai Violetai maģija nešķiet īpaši aizraujoša, tāpēc viņa vienīgā nespēj nokārtot eksāmenu, lai iegūtu kristālu, kas fejām ļauj iekļūt cilvēku pasaulē. Violeta neļauj skumjām vaļu, nozog kristālu citai fejai un nokļūst 12 gadus vecās bārenītes Maksijas istabā. Tomēr, ak vai! Kristāls saplīst, un nu Violeta ir iesprostota cilvēku pasaulē! Kopā ar Maksiju viņa meklē atpakaļceļu un atklāj savu patieso aicinājumu.

programme.title: Pūķi: Nakts fūrijas dāvana
programme.desc: Vikingu pilsēta Berka, kas tagad izbauda jauno aliansi ar pūķiem, gatavojas saviem ikgadējiem ziemas saulgriežu svētkiem. Tomēr svētku gars tiek apdraudēts, kad visi pūķi, izņemot Nezobu, nezināma iemesla dēļ pēkšņi aizlido. Kamēr Astrīda neveiksmīgi mēģina atrisināt šo problēmu, Hikaps nolemj uztaisīt Nezobam jaunu protēzi, lai viņš varētu lidot patstāvīgi. Tomēr, tuvojoties svētkiem, Hikaps uzzina pūķu noslēpumu un meklē risinājumu, kā tos atvest mājās.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Ričards ir jauns zvirbulēns, kuru savā lokā pieņēmusi stārķu ģimene. Viņš pavada ziemu Āfrikas ziemeļos, taču ir pienācis laiks atgriezties mājās. Ričards vēlas vadīt gājputnu kāsi, bet šim uzdevumam tiek izraudzīts viņa pusbrālis Makss. Jaunais putnēns jūtas aizvainots, taču drīz sākas vētrains piedzīvojums. Tirāniskais pāvs Zamano sagūsta Ričarda draugu. Zamano atsakās viņu laist brīvībā, kamēr Ričards neatrisinās mīklu un neatradīs Zamano dārgakmeni.

programme.title: Mīlestība dejas ritmā
programme.desc: Talantīgā balerīna Bārlova nolēmusi īstenot savu sapni Amerikas mākslas svētnīcā Ņujorkā. Diemžēl iepazīšanās ar svētnīcas realitāti nav īpaši patīkama – pieredzējusī baleta pasniedzēja Oksana skaidri un gaiši pasaka: Bārlova vēl nav ne tuvu pilnībai. Norijusi krupi, meitene nepadodas un piedalās jaunas Brodvejas deju izrādes atlasē. Režisors Zanders pievērš uzmanību Bārlovai un izvēlas viņu mēģinājumiem. Pēc dažām dienām topošās izrādes kodolam pievienojas talantīgais pianists Čārlijs. Tāpat kā Bārlova, viņš ieradies Ņujorkā, lai īstenotu sapni. Puisim un meitenei rodas simpātijas vienam pret otru, bet Zanders nav vienaldzīgs pret meiteni. Bārlova drīz vien sapinas mīlas trīsstūrī. Izrādes mēģinājumi kļūst arvien intensīvāki, slodze aug, un ne Bārlovai, ne Čārlijam neatliek laika nekam citam. Darbs vaiga sviedros, nemitīgā spriedze, sāncenšu nodevība un cīņa bez kompromisiem prasa visus spēkus.

programme.title: Marmelāde
programme.desc: Filma par kādu ieslodzīto, kurš ar savu veiklo kameras biedru dalās paša izdomātā krāšņā, romantiskā bankas aplaupīšanas stāstā un izbēg, apvienojoties ar savas dzīves mīlestību.

programme.title: Ups! Piedzīvojumi turpinās
programme.desc: Uz Noasa šķirsta kļūst nemierīgi – kuģis pārāk ilgi kuģo pa jūru, zeme nav redzama un pārtikas krājumi sarūk arvien vairāk. Kādu dienu ceļotāji patiešām atklāj salu, taču uz tās ir aktīvs vulkāns, un arī salas iedzīvotāji nav visai viesmīlīgi.

programme.title: Panda Mēness
programme.desc: Pēc sliktām atzīmēm 12 gadus vecais Tiaņs tiek nosūtīts pie vecmāmiņas uz attāliem Ķīnas kalniem. Tur viņš sadraudzējas ar pandu, kuru nosauc par Mēnesi, un šī draudzība aizsāk neparastu piedzīvojumu, kas izmaina viņa ģimenes dzīvi.

programme.title: Pats varmācīgākais gads
programme.desc: 1981. gads Ņujorkā. Ambiciozs imigrants cīnās par savu uzņēmumu un ģimeni visbīstamākajā gadā šīs pilsētas vēsturē.

programme.title: Balerīna
programme.desc: Slepkava, apmācīta Ruska Roma organizācijas tradīcijās, dodas atriebt tēva nāvi.

programme.title: Slepkavas kodekss
programme.desc: Kad Anna bija bērns, viņu no nāves izglāba leģendārais slepkava Mūdijs. Apguvusi sava glābēja arodu, Anna ir kļuvusi par vienu no prasmīgākajām pasūtījuma slepkavām pasaulē. Kad Mūdijs tiek nogalināts, viņa nozvēras atriebties un nogalināt to, kurš atņēmis dzīvību cilvēkam, kurš viņai iemācījis visu.

programme.title: Bastīlijas diena
programme.desc: Straujajā un spraigajā trillerī Bastīlijas diena būs spiesti sadarboties divi pavisam dažādu jomu profesionāļi. Viens no viņiem ir CIP slepenais aģents, pieredzējis tik daudz, ka ar to pietiktu krietnam simtam parastu mirstīgo, otrs – nevainojami savu amatu apguvis kabatzaglis. No viņu sekmīgas sadarbības atkarīga speciālo dienestu aģenta turpmākā karjera, zagļa brīvība, miers visā Parīzē un pat stabilitāte pasaulē.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Zvirbulis Ričijs kopš dzimšanas pieņemts stārķu ģimenē, visi viņu ļoti mīl, viņš ātri aug un jūtas kā īsts stārķis. Taču gājputniem stārķiem pienāk laiks lidot uz Āfriku, lai tur ziemotu. Ģimene ir spiesta atklāt Ričijam viņa izcelšanos, jo lidot kopā nedrīkst – grūtajā ceļojumā zvirbulis var iet bojā. Drosminieks negrasās nolaist spārnus un nolemj visiem pierādīt, ka ir īsts stārķis. Ričijs viens pats dodas ceļā, un viņam pievienojas jauni draugi – pūce Olga un papagailis Kiki.

programme.title: Naudas cena: Largo Vinča piedzīvojums
programme.desc: Largo Vinčs izmisīgi meklē savu nolaupīto dēlu, saprotot, ka pēdas pie tiem, kas izraisījuši viņa bankrotu, varētu aizvest arī pie Largo dēla.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Mīlīgā mazpilsētiņā atrodas melna māja ar nedzīvu zālāju. Kaimiņi pat nenojauš, ka zem mājas atrodas milzu paslēptuve. Sīku pakalpiņu armijas apsargāts, Grū kaldina plānus lielākajai laupīšanai pasaules vēsturē. Viņš ir iecerējis nolaupīt Mēnesi. Jā, Mēnesi! Grū patīk viss ļaunais. Bruņojies ar samazināšanas lāzeru, sasaldēšanas staru un dažnedažādiem kaujas transporta līdzekļiem braukšanai pa zemi un pa gaisu, viņš iznīdē visu, kas gadās ceļā, līdz kādu dienu sastop trīs bārenītes ar apbrīnojamu gribasspēku…

programme.title: Karalisks piedāvājums
programme.desc: 2010. gadā pirms Arābu pavasara izmisušam amerikāņu tirgonim Alanam (Toms Henks) pēc mājas zaudēšanas un šķiršanās no sievas dzīvē ir iestājusies krīze. Izmisīgi cenšoties atgūt atpakaļ savu sievu, viņš dodas uz Saūda Arābiju, lai valdībai pārdotu hologrāfisku telekonferences sistēmu. Cieši apņēmies noslēgt līgumu un nepalikt uz sēkļa brūkošā ekonomikā, viņš mācās, kā izturēties svešā kultūrā ar taksometra vadītāja (Aleksandrs Bleks) un vietējā ārsta palīdzību (Sarita Čodrija)

programme.title: Džūdija
programme.desc: Biogrāfiska drāma par izcilās ASV dziedātājas un aktrises Džūdijas Gārlendas dzīvi. Gārlenda 1968. gadā, gadu pirms savas nāves, devās uz Eiropu, lai koncertētu Londonā. Filmā attēloti pēdējie mēneši kinozvaigznes dzīvē, pirms viņa izdarīja pašnāvību.

programme.title: Misija: Izglābt tīģeri
programme.desc: Jauns supervaronis iedraudzējas ar apdraudētu tīģeri, ko sastapis piknika laikā mežā, un uzsāk drosmīgu glābšanas misiju.

programme.title: Lemāna-66: Lielais izaicinājums
programme.desc: Filmas sižets balstīts patiesos notikumus un atgādina par autosporta vēstures spriedzes pilnām lapaspusēm. Notikumi risinās 60. gados, kad konstruktoru grupa, kuru vadīja Kerols Šelbijs, kopā ar britu sacīkšu braucēju Kenu Mailsu uzbūvēja vēl nebijušu "Ford" sporta automašīnu un meta izaicinājumu Lemānas 24 stundu sacīkšu favorītam "Ferrari".

programme.title: Tusnīte
programme.desc: Trīs draudzeņu vidū Bjanka ir visatšķirīgākā – gandrīz neredzama. Pasniedzēji neatceras viņas vārdu, un skolasbiedri – nesveicina. Bjankai pašai liekas, ka viss ir kārtībā, bet bērnības draugs skolas smukulītis Vess atklāj, kāds ir meitenes patiesais statuss nežēlīgajā skolas hierarhijā. Pateicoties puisim, Bjanka nolemj mainīt dzīvi. Taču meitenes apņemšanos apdraud skolas skaistule Medisona, kuras nākotnes plānos ietilpst dalība kādā realitātes šovā, tāpēc jau laikus viņa iejūtas lomā, katru savas ikdienas soli dokumentējot ar mobilo telefonu un sociālajos tīklos audzējot "biezu ādu". Viņasprāt, tikai nejauks cilvēks var sasniegt panākumus.

programme.title: After. Pēc kritiena
programme.desc: Tesa ir gatava jaunam dzīves posmam. Spožais prestižas koledžas diploms paver jaunas iespējas – meitene atrod sapņu darbu starptautiskā kompānijā. Viņas nodoms pārcelties uz Sietlu nemaz neiepriecina Hārdinu. Viņa neapmierinātība, pārmetumi un mūžīgā greizsirdība sāpīgi ievaino Tesu un rada bažas. Vai ir vērts visu likt uz kārts un upurēt daudzsološu karjeru? Taču kā lai aizmirst kopā pavadītās naktis un kaislīgos skūpstus, viņa ciešos vīrieša apskāvienus un tuvību, kas padara traku?

programme.title: Argentīna,
programme.desc: Sacenšoties ar laiku, 80. gados juristu komanda neticamā cīņā cenšas atmaskot Argentīnas asiņainās militārās diktatūras vadītājus.

programme.title: Episkā filma
programme.desc: Episkais ķinis ir ļoti episks, par to nešaubieties! Stāsta centrā ir četri bāreņi – vienu no tiem piedzīvojumā ierauj Luvras kuratora pēctecis, otrs grib kļūt par meksikāņu brīvības cīnītāju, trešo bāreni sastopam, pateicoties čūskām lidmašīnā, bet ceturtais ir puslīdz normāls mutants no X sabiedrības. Katrs no četriem mīklainos apstākļos tiek pie zelta biļetes, kas sniedz iespēju apmeklēt šokolādes fabriku. Viens pēc otra viņi iekuļas dīvainā drēbju skapī, kas nabagus aiztransportē uz Gnārnias zemi (ar G!). Tur viņi sastop ekstravagantu pirātu kapteini, kā arī nopietnus burvestību skolas studentus un noslēdz sadarbības līgumu ar gudru, bet seksuāli norūpējušos lauvu, lai pieveiktu ļauno Balto Kuci, kas uzkundzējusies Gnārnijā.

programme.title: Atstātie
programme.desc: 1970. gada Ziemassvētki. Prestižā skolā uz svētku brīvdienām paliek visu nīstais skolotājs Pols, skolas pavāre Mērija un piecpadsmit gadus vecais Anguss. Pa šīm dienām šie tik ļoti atšķirīgie cilvēki ne tikai iemācīsies sadzīvot un saprast viens otru, bet arī mainīs viens otra dzīves uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Olympiacos Piraeus - Paris Basketball
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: WRC. Saudu Arābija. Žurnāls
programme.desc: The latest news and action from the FIA World Rally Championship, plus a look ahead to the next round in Croatia.

programme.title: Cīņus sports: One Championship. ONE Friday Fights
programme.desc: ONE Championship is a mixed martial arts (MMA) organization that showcases world-class fighters from across the globe. With a focus on martial arts values and a commitment to integrity, the league promotes adrenaline-pumping, action-packed fights that entertain and inspire fans worldwide. ONE Championship not only showcases the skills of elite fighters, but also highlights the cultural aspects of martial arts, making it a unique and captivating sporting experience.

programme.title: NBA .. Cavaliers - Bucks
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: Basketbols: BCL. Joventut - Hapoel Holon
programme.desc: Basketball live game.

programme.title: Hokejs: Šveices Nacionālā līga. Davos - Ambri/Piotta
programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

programme.title: Hokejs: Šveices Nacionālā līga. Lakers - Geneve
programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Baskonia - FC Bayern
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: LaLiga. Barcelona - Athletic Bilbao
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Borussia - Stuttgart
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Cīņus sports: One Championship. ONE Friday Fights
programme.desc: ONE Championship is a mixed martial arts (MMA) organization that showcases world-class fighters from across the globe. With a focus on martial arts values and a commitment to integrity, the league promotes adrenaline-pumping, action-packed fights that entertain and inspire fans worldwide. ONE Championship not only showcases the skills of elite fighters, but also highlights the cultural aspects of martial arts, making it a unique and captivating sporting experience.

programme.title: UFC. Arman Tsarukyan-Dan Hooker
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

Fixer to Fabulous: Welcome Inn
programme.desc: Follow married couple Dave and Jenny Marrs as they undertake a challenging renovation project, transforming a 19th century historic home into a bed and breakfast. As soon as they saw the property in Bentonville, Arkansas the idea was born. The financial stakes are high, as the place has been abandoned for a long time, but Dave and Jenny are determined to turn it into an inn of their dreams. Join as we follow their journey every step of the way in detail, as they face various issues, from construction to bee infestation and a lot more.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn take on a home in central Honolulu thats been abandoned for 20 years - and its their most challenging transformation yet.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: Izzy Does It
programme.desc: Overwhelmed with their kids toys and clutter, a family calls on Izzy to create a modern zen space. Plus, he consults Tarek El Moussa for advice.

programme.title: Beach Around the World
programme.desc: House hunters explore properties on some of the dreamiest beaches around the globe. From a rustic retreat on a tropical island in Thailand to a luxurious seaside hideaway in Portugal, families turn oceanside getaways into their everyday dream homes.

programme.title: Beach Around the World
programme.desc: House hunters explore properties on some of the dreamiest beaches around the globe. From a rustic retreat on a tropical island in Thailand to a luxurious seaside hideaway in Portugal, families turn oceanside getaways into their everyday dream homes.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a Swedish teenager photograph some of the most convincing UFO evidence ever? Is a video posted online showing a pterodactyl-like creature flying over Idaho the real deal? Why are headless goats repeatedly being dumped in an Atlanta River?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum saddle up and head deep into the heart of Texas! In Fort Worth, the trio unearths a treasure trove including a rare Gretsch White Penguin guitar, a Smith and Wesson revolver, and a "Wonder Man" comic signed by Stan Lee.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are making big deals in the smallest state! In Providence, Rhode Island, the guys cruise over to a muscle car collection, check out a rare book written by John Adams, and take aim at a harpoon gun.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: A UFO spotted over one of the worlds holiest sites. And could a mysterious floating "spaceman" in a famous photograph be an elaborate, decades-long hoax? Plus, "superhumans" who can stop cars barehanded.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: In small towns, and along Americas back roads, treasures are waiting to be uncovered - valuable relics from history that are hidden in junk piles, buried in barns and stacked in garages. It takes special experts to find these lost artifacts and hopefully turn rust to riches. AMERICAN PICKERS follows two of the most skilled "pickers" Mike Wolfe, owner of Antique Archaeology, and his business partner, Frank Fritz, as they hunt down objects with historical, collectible and pop culture value that have been long forgotten by their owners. Along the way, they meet people whose own stories open a window into American lives and history.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: Human Genesis. Based solely on Charles Darwins Theory of Evolution, the rapid development of modern humans seems impossible without a "missing link." Could this link involve extraterrestrial intervention?

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are hitting the road to look for treasures in Tampa, Florida. Helming a crew of experts, the guys will plunder everything from Pokemon cards to Steve McQueens motorcycle, hoping to make waves in the Sunshine State.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum head to Louisville to bet on a collection of vintage spirits, a pair of goggles signed by Kentucky Derby jockey Jon Court, and a vintage pedal car. Later, they visit the Louisville Slugger factory, for a home run of a surprise.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum rev up their engines and roll into Detroit, Michigan. With their favourite experts in tow, Rick suits up for some samurai armour and tries to drive down the price of a luxury car collection.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: The hunt for extraordinary deals heats up as Rick, Corey, and Chum make their way down to Mesa, Arizona. Rick encounters a rugged Big Willy Jeep, Chum fangirls over some 2010 Justin Bieber trading cards, and Corey is struck by some Napoleonic medals.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Swamp Monster, Sphere Sightings. Is this newly found footage from the 1970s proof that Sasquatch is living in the swamps of Louisiana? Whats up with the recent trend in flying sphere sightings and should we be concerned?

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Shipwrecks, plane crashes, disappearances, and UFO sightings, oh my! This episode explores the Lake Michigan Triangle and many other wild and weird places, including a creepy doll-filled island, and caves that harbor deadly viruses.

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: The Antwerp Diamond Heist. An elite crew of Italian thieves targets the vault of the Antwerp World Diamond Centre. After 27 months of planning, they execute their intricate plan and make off with more than 100 million dollars.

programme.title: Original Gangsters with Sean Bean
programme.desc: Everyone knows the Peaky Blinders of Stephen Knights smash hit BBC drama, but far fewer know the reality the series was based on, the real-life men who terrorised Birmingham in the late 19th and early 20th centuries.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: The Ultimate Evidence
programme.desc: Why are humans so different from every other species on Earth? Did we evolve from apes or is our intelligence the result of contact with an otherworldly source?

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
