programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētā ierodas fermere, kas lūdz Rabla komandu uzcelt kūti viņas cūciņai. Vai suņuki paspēs to paveikt līdz lielajai Rukšu ballei? Motores īpašā dzimšanas dienas dāvana aizkavējas, jo izrādās, ka Celtnieklīcim vajadzīgs lielāks skrejceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Nē! Nē! Tas nav beidzies! Barbabravo nav mazs, viņš ir liels puika! No šis dienas viņš tā arī dzīvos - nekādu snaudu, uzkodu un spēlēšanās ar brāļiem un māsām. // Barbabērni pirmoreiz dodas uz lielveikalu. Tik daudz preču, lieliska vieta! Bet kāpēc viss satīts plastmasas plēvēs?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komandai jāizdekorē Sjerras Spīdošās skatuve, koncerts izvēršas neticams Bodnieks Gabriels rīko savu gardumu izstādi, un Rabla komanda dodas palīgā.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora uzzina, ka viņas vecmamma nav svinējusi savus Pieaugšanas svētkus, un sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti ar īpašu kleitu, diadēmu un kurpēm! Doras draugam Koko nav aizraujoša stāsta, ar ko izklaidēt biedrus, tāpēc viņi dodas pie Pastāstu koka!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā. Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti. Kad Terija pieskata bērnus, Tims cenšas apiet visus noteikumus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Komanda ar Ķepu Patruļas Maršalu būvē pirmo ugunsdzēsības departamentu. Kad Maršala ugunsdzēsības mašīna tiek sabotēta, visi strādā kopā, lai nodzēstu uguni

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš atrod Doras pazudušo dzimšanas dienas torti, un visa ģimene sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti! Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz Mēnesnīcai atrast Mēnesspuķi, lai visi varētu priecāties Mēnessgaismas fiestā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: No kalna izbēdzis āzis izraisa haosu, aprīdams visu, kas pagadās! Bali nekur nav atrodama, un Barbapapa liek lietā savu attapību, meklējot viņu. Viņi pat nenojauš, kāds pārsteigums viņus gaida.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Laipnais lāčuks Padingtons pārvācas uz Londonu pēc tam, kad zemestrīce iznīcina viņa mājokli. Te viņš apmetas uz dzīvi pie Braunu ģimenes – Henrija, Mērijas, Džūdijas un Džonatana. Kaimiņos viņiem dzīvo īgnais Karija kungs, kuram enerģiskais lācēns diez ko nepatīk. Padingtons katru dienu raksta vēstules savai tantei Lūsijai, kurās stāsta par dienas piedzīvojumiem un pārsteigumiem.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons palīdz izperēt olu, bet ir jāgaida ļoti ilgi. Kad tā beidzot izšķiļas, viņš tiek pie pārsteiguma! Padingtons vēlas, kaut varētu piedalīties Braunu kāzās, apskatot fotogrāfijas, un viņi nolemj to visu atkārtot!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Reindžere Roza lūdz Rabla komandu salabot Lāču salas tiltu. Kad remontdarbos iejaucas Ātrmeistars, ķepaiņiem jāsatīra viņa radītā nekārtība un jāpasargā lāčus no ātri tuvojošās vētras... ar tantes Celtnes jaunās Būvētavas Bultas palīdzību.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Autokinoteātrī tiek izrādīta jauna Supervāveres filma. Kad Ātrmeistars sarīko kārtējo jezgu, ķepaiņiem jārīkojas, lai glābtu situāciju. Ir Tanšu diena! Vai ķepaiņi paspēs uzbūvēt dāvanu tantei Celtnei?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda palīdz Riveram uzņemt daudz fotogrāfiju foto konkursam, uzbūvējot ļoti ātru veidu, kā pārvietoties pa Celtnieklīci. Rabls un ķepaiņi palīdz Karlam pagatavot saldējumu visiem. Ja vien Ātrmeistars viņiem netraucēs...

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jack and Lily are half-siblings living on opposite ends of the world both hoping to have the "best summer ever." When dangerous events forces Jacks mom to send him to live with his dad, the kids fear their summer dreams have become a nightmare.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Will and Min show Jack around to help him find a good story. Lily spills boba in Jacks suitcase and tries to hide the evidence. Jack tries to find "the big picture" as Lily shows him how to spend a perfect summer day in Canyon Valley.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe discover that Lazlo Chance may be the evil Mastermind and enlist Chloe to help. B.C. is back from France and is transferring to Chloes school. The twins ask her to steal B.C.s ring to get into Lazlo Chances office to discover the truth about the Mastermind. Chloe steals the ring but feels incredibly guilty and hides it from her siblings. B.C. invites Chloe and her friends to his yacht for a party and to catch up. The twins discover the ring in the house and call in their parents for help, and Billy tags along. They ground Chloes powers and take her back to Hiddenville. The twins enter Lazlo Chances office and discover that Lazlo is not the true Mastermind and has been mind-controlled. Chloe runs away to B.C.s yacht to confront him about his dad. B.C. reveals to Chloe that hes the true Mastermind behind it all, and if she doesnt listen to him, he is going to hurt her friends.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: B.C. forces Chloe to steal a magical amulet hidden in a cave underneath Hiddenshores that grants him the power to steal other superheroes powers. Trying to protect her friends, Chloe obtains it for him, only for him to reveal her he turned her friends evil anyway. Max and Phoebe discover its really B.C. who is the evil master mind. Hank, Barb, and Billy return to let them know Chloe ran away. B.C. sends a drone filled with laughing gas to stop the Thundemands from coming after him, they manage to escape. Max, Phoebe, Billy, and Chloe steal a part of the amulet back, and Mastermind goes after them. In order for Chloe to save her friends, she has to reveal her secret identity to them. Chloe teleports herself and the twins back to the cave to return the crystal from the magical amulet. Mastermind follows them, and as he is not a true superhero, the cave refuses to let him have it and captures him, allowing them to take B.C. to the Hero League.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe discover that Lazlo Chance may be the evil Mastermind and enlist Chloe to help. B.C. is back from France and is transferring to Chloes school. The twins ask her to steal B.C.s ring to get into Lazlo Chances office to discover the truth about the Mastermind. Chloe steals the ring but feels incredibly guilty and hides it from her siblings. B.C. invites Chloe and her friends to his yacht for a party and to catch up. The twins discover the ring in the house and call in their parents for help, and Billy tags along. They ground Chloes powers and take her back to Hiddenville. The twins enter Lazlo Chances office and discover that Lazlo is not the true Mastermind and has been mind-controlled. Chloe runs away to B.C.s yacht to confront him about his dad. B.C. reveals to Chloe that hes the true Mastermind behind it all, and if she doesnt listen to him, he is going to hurt her friends.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: B.C. forces Chloe to steal a magical amulet hidden in a cave underneath Hiddenshores that grants him the power to steal other superheroes powers. Trying to protect her friends, Chloe obtains it for him, only for him to reveal her he turned her friends evil anyway. Max and Phoebe discover its really B.C. who is the evil master mind. Hank, Barb, and Billy return to let them know Chloe ran away. B.C. sends a drone filled with laughing gas to stop the Thundemands from coming after him, they manage to escape. Max, Phoebe, Billy, and Chloe steal a part of the amulet back, and Mastermind goes after them. In order for Chloe to save her friends, she has to reveal her secret identity to them. Chloe teleports herself and the twins back to the cave to return the crystal from the magical amulet. Mastermind follows them, and as he is not a true superhero, the cave refuses to let him have it and captures him, allowing them to take B.C. to the Hero League.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Carls dreams are crushed after meeting El Falcon, Bobby decides to take on the role himself! ) 18:00 Big Blue Sibling underwater adventurers Lettie and Lemo lead a quirky submarine crew exploring and protecting a vast ocean-covered planet. Can they unravel the mysterious secrets of their underwater universe? (Subtitled) 18:15 Big Blue Sibling underwater adventurers Lettie and Lemo lead a quirky submarine crew exploring and protecting a vast ocean-covered planet. Can they unravel the mysterious secrets of their underwater universe? (Subtitled)

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Lily and Jack keep neglecting their chores. Which wouldnt normally be a problem except that Canyon Valleys business inspector is on her way to the Groom and Board, and the kids forgot to plunge the sink in the trailer. Will and Lil are tasked with cleaning up the trailer while Min and Jack rush off to the hardware store to buy a piece of pipe. But things go bad to worse as Will and Lil keep finding more problems to deal with in the trailer and Min and Jack must stall the Inspectors arrival. // Chuck announces his newest hustle: a sleepaway theatre camp! Knowing it must be a scam, Jack and Lil are eager to revel in the chaos. The "cabaret acts" include strange chanting, weird cat noises, and Halmoni (a kid at heart). But when they discover that its not JUST a scam to Chuck but in fact his lifes dream, they must save the show and the theater from destruction!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe discover that Lazlo Chance may be the evil Mastermind and enlist Chloe to help. B.C. is back from France and is transferring to Chloes school. The twins ask her to steal B.C.s ring to get into Lazlo Chances office to discover the truth about the Mastermind. Chloe steals the ring but feels incredibly guilty and hides it from her siblings. B.C. invites Chloe and her friends to his yacht for a party and to catch up. The twins discover the ring in the house and call in their parents for help, and Billy tags along. They ground Chloes powers and take her back to Hiddenville. The twins enter Lazlo Chances office and discover that Lazlo is not the true Mastermind and has been mind-controlled. Chloe runs away to B.C.s yacht to confront him about his dad. B.C. reveals to Chloe that hes the true Mastermind behind it all, and if she doesnt listen to him, he is going to hurt her friends.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: B.C. forces Chloe to steal a magical amulet hidden in a cave underneath Hiddenshores that grants him the power to steal other superheroes powers. Trying to protect her friends, Chloe obtains it for him, only for him to reveal her he turned her friends evil anyway. Max and Phoebe discover its really B.C. who is the evil master mind. Hank, Barb, and Billy return to let them know Chloe ran away. B.C. sends a drone filled with laughing gas to stop the Thundemands from coming after him, they manage to escape. Max, Phoebe, Billy, and Chloe steal a part of the amulet back, and Mastermind goes after them. In order for Chloe to save her friends, she has to reveal her secret identity to them. Chloe teleports herself and the twins back to the cave to return the crystal from the magical amulet. Mastermind follows them, and as he is not a true superhero, the cave refuses to let him have it and captures him, allowing them to take B.C. to the Hero League.

No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.desc: The school is looking for a new mascot, and Chloe and her new friends think they can make an impression by designing the winning entry. After Chloe discovers what theyve done and is furious with them, Max and Phoebe realize that being her guardian comes with more responsibility than they imagined.

programme.title: Super Duper Bunny League

programme.title: Planet Sheen
programme.desc: Washing My Sheen:Sheen vows to never bathe again and accidentally attracts a horde of destructive, filth-loving beasts.Stuck in the Riddle with You:Sheen has to use his matchless wit to rid Zeenu and save his friends from a carnivorous, pretentious plant called the Dentamental.

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Canadian computer-animated television series Top Wing presents an exciting story of four courageous young birds, Swift, Penny, Brody, and Rod on Big Swirl Island. They are cadets at Top Wing Academy with the best of the best students and have access to the most advanced technology. By operating different vehicles like a submarine, a boat, a jet or a motorcycle, the cadets learn how to work as a team and are the first to rush to the rescue to those in trouble. Major lessons are learnt with the help of their mentor Speedy. With every new task performed the cadets become braver, stronger and smarter.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. On top of that, her beloved brother, Antony, is away at his first year of college and Hazel is feeling lonely without him. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its picture day at school! And on top of that, theyre serving the most delicious pudding at lunchtime! Only problem is, Dev has control of the pudding supply and is hoarding it. Hazel takes the power back by wishing that everyone had an unlimited supply of pudding. Pudding is everywhere and Dev is out of business! But things take a turn when people cant stop eating it and turn into pudding zombies. Now Hazel not only has to save picture day, but also stop a pudding apocalypse!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its picture day at school! And on top of that, theyre serving the most delicious pudding at lunchtime! Only problem is, Dev has control of the pudding supply and is hoarding it. Hazel takes the power back by wishing that everyone had an unlimited supply of pudding. Pudding is everywhere and Dev is out of business! But things take a turn when people cant stop eating it and turn into pudding zombies. Now Hazel not only has to save picture day, but also stop a pudding apocalypse! // Hoping to win "Most Spirited Hair" for School Spirit Week, Hazel wishes her hair had spirit! Cosmo and Wanda take this literally and give her hair a spirit, bringing it to life as Diana the Diva! When Hazel and Diana "butt heads" over how best to showcase her, Diana runs away. Hazel chases her all over town but cant catch her. Later, Diana shows up at Hazels school aiming to enter the contest on her own. Hazel must find a way to reconcile with Diana if she hopes to win Diana back and win the contest.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Cosmo and Wanda grant a wish to make Hazels potato project work for the Science Fair, they rewrite the rules of science for the whole universe! When the physical world goes haywire as a result, they cant undo it because not even their magic is not working correctly! And Sci, the Science Fairy, refuses to help Hazel because he does not approve of her shortcut. Hazel must learn the real science behind her potato project to power up Cosmo and Wandas wands and set the universe right again. // After watching a detective TV show with her dad, Hazel wishes she could solve a mystery like a genuine gumshoe. At first, she is wrapped up in the thrill of solving a mystery, but things get real when the landlord goes missing. Everyone is a suspect - kids at school, the strange new neighbors, and even Cosmo and Wanda! Things intensify when Hazel suspects her family is the next target. In a dramatic climax at dinner at her neighbors, Hazel unveils the truth. Is it foul play? Or is it just her imagination?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Feline Fervor: King Julien is literally bounced out of his kingdom and onto the New York streets. A kindly old lady thinks hes a cat and swoops him up. Hes encroaching on anothers turf, though - the apartments already home to a feline-impersonator, a female ferret named Zoe. Julien is taken with Zoe, and puts on his best seduction moves. Will the street-smart ferret succumb to his kingly charms? Smart money says… you never know! Action Reaction: Skipper is forced to live his worst nightmare when hes doused with Inflatium and stress causes him to blow up like a balloon. Guess what this means… no more going on missions! Sitting behind a desk doing paperwork instead! Hans takes advantage of the situation and targets a massive weapons lab, and without Skipper the penguins are easily captured. How can Skipper combat the evil puffin if hes in a puffy state?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Mental Hen: Kowalski has a rival, if you even can call it a rivalry. A Delaware Blue Hen has taken up residence at the zoo, and she has the amazing ability to predict the future! Kowalski doesnt buy the psychic chicken hype and sets out to discredit her. The truth turns out to be far more sinister than a simple sports-pickin chicken, and Kowalski will have to use all his best moves to wiggle out of this mess. Thumb Drive: The penguins need a thumb, and Maurices fits the bill nicely. Using the opposable digit thumbprint to break into a secret weapons lab gets the penguins all atwitter. King Julien is unhappy that his right hand man is running around on missions with the birds so he sets out to sabotage the mission. As with most of King Juliens plans, this scheme turns out to be "thumbs down"!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj
programme.desc: Everyone in town is shimmying to the latest Bollywood dance trend: The Tavish Twist! Raj loves it, but Sammy is not so keen.// When Dadas manuscript goes missing, its up to Sammy, Raj and Tara to find out "who dun it?"

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Best Foes: Kowalski invents an enemy detector. As is often the case, it doesnt work, and Skipper gets his own wires crossed when he smashes it. Old enemies are now friends and old friends are now enemies as the boss bird starts to systematically clean out the zoo with the help of his new friend Hans. King Julien gets into the act by becoming Skippers friend too, going so far as to Congaga dance together. New BFF Hans is not happy with the new bromance, however. Could this be the opening the penguins need? Night of the Vesuviuses: The annual Zoo Snooze is here! Kids get to buy tickets for a zoo sleepover, a treat the animals look forward to every year! This years going to be very different, however, when the rotten Vesuvius Twins buy up all the tickets themselves. The zoosters plan to turn the tables, though, and exact sweet revenge on the twins. The penguins, influenced by Private of course, cant let this happen, and its a long nights journey into day as the penguins scramble to protect their one-time tormentors.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester decide Grumpy Pants needs more excitement and take him to have the most extreme cup of tea ever. // In this years Capture the Flag contest Best listens to other peoples ideas even if they havent got a war room.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: The twins go to great lengths to protect Bests enjoyment of his book and realize spoilers arent so bad after all. // Best and Bester may have jumped the line for the new fish restaurant, but once inside things take a dramatic turn.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Sharing isnt easy for the twins and after a particularly heated argument they decide split the treehouse in half. // In order to win a local gardening competition, Best attempts to grow a plant, and Bester decides to be a plant.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: When Diamondo refuses to give the twins a ride in his spaceship they embark on some space exploration of their own. // Best becomes entangled in a series of awkward situations when he pretends to know someone hes never met before.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Bester unwittingly uncovers the not so delicious goings on in Fritz Fritters top secret Donut Wonderland Factory. // Best and Bester dig up Captain Ironfoots Cursed Amulet on the beach only to find that Deep Sea Belle wants it too.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: The series Bubble Guppies revolves around the underwater adventures of a group of mermaid-like preschoolers who life in the fictional underwater city of Bubbletucky. The episode starts with a sketch of Molly saying "Hi, its me Molly and its time for-" only to be stopped by Gil doing the subject of the show. When Gil or Molly says "Its time for Bubble Guppies!", the theme song starts. After the theme song, the Little Fish say the episodes name. Something happens when a character goes to school. After that, the school day begins and the Bubble Guppies say "Good morning, Mr. Grouper!". Later, the remaining Guppie tells Mr. Grouper about what happened earlier. He states "Lets think about it," and the characters discuss the topic. The pop song for the episode then begins.One of the Guppies will go to a shop that mostly focuses on the topic. The owner of the shop will asks questions about what he or she needs. Later, Mr. Grouper comes into the shop and says its time for lunch, and the "Lunchtime" song plays. At lunch the characters make a food joke about the subject of the episode. After lunch, another Gil and Molly sketch is shown. The Guppies do something fun which leads Mr. Grouper talking more about the topic, which leads into a dancing song. Mr. Grouper then says its time to go outside, the "Outside" song plays, and the Guppies make up a story about the topic. After this, Gil and Molly do another sketch.The Guppies go on a field trip that focuses on the topic, and the show concludes with the last Gil and Molly sketch and a shorter version of the theme song.

programme.title: Breadwinners
programme.desc: Two ducks with thin legs and round faces, SwaySway and Buhdeuce, are best friends. They fly around the water-based planet Pondgea in a rocket-powered van and deliver fresh bread to its citizens. They often find themselves in awkward and funny situations, and sometimes their workdays are quite dangerous. They find new friends, deal with opponents and have fun, making sure Pondgea always receive fresh bread on time.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day. // Hazel has planned a night of watching scary movies with her new friend, Jasmine, but it turns out Jasmine hates scary movies. Rather than change the plan, Hazel wishes Jasmine had no fears. When Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, the fears escape Jasmines mind, coming into the real world. Hazel tries fighting the fears off but learns its Jasmine who must face them to make them disappear. Now, shes got to talk her new friend into doing everything shes most afraid of, which gets the attention of Fear Itself!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel and Jasmine have planned their very first sleepover but Dev Dimmadome threatens to throw an even better party! To draw her classmates attention Hazel boasts that she lives in a luxury hotel and wishes her apartment building into The Wellsington Hotelsington Hotel. Now she must balance running the hottest hotel in Dimmadelphia and spending time with Jasmine and Winn before they check out of the friendship! // Hoping to win a class superlative, Hazel wishes to be famous at her school. Father Time cuts her a deal for 1,500 minutes of fame, but Principal Krentz is not happy about Hazels celebrity status and threatens to transfer her if she doesnt stop being a "distraction" by the end of lunch. With tons of time left on her wish, Nick of Time arrives with a solution: if Hazel acts like a New Yorker, her remaining minutes will turn into New York Minutes and pass faster. Can Hazel act New Yorky enough to beat the clock?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hoping to win "Most Spirited Hair" for School Spirit Week, Hazel wishes her hair had spirit! Cosmo and Wanda take this literally and give her hair a spirit, bringing it to life as Diana the Diva! When Hazel and Diana "butt heads" over how best to showcase her, Diana runs away. Hazel chases her all over town but cant catch her. Later, Diana shows up at Hazels school aiming to enter the contest on her own. Hazel must find a way to reconcile with Diana if she hopes to win Diana back and win the contest.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazels feelings are hurt when her friends decide to go to the school dance instead of her book club. She storms off, but then realizes she wants to go to the dance too. Hazel wishes for Kennueth, a half-fish, half-man character from her favorite manga, to come out of his story and take her to the dance. Hazel must get through the dance before Kennueths true form, and magic, are revealed. // Hazel learns about the harmful effects of trash and pollution on Earth, so she wishes that people wouldnt be such trash monsters. Cosmo and Wanda summon a friendly, talking, trash eating dumpster named Danky! Together they spread the word about sustainability and caring for the earth. Then, Dale Dimmadome tricks Danky into helping him sell more products, making people even bigger trash monsters! Hazel must get Danky back and stop Dale Dimmadome in his wasteful tracks.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its Kindness Day! Mr. Guzman announces that if all students complete one act of kindness, theyll get a class pizza party-and Hazel wants that pizza! But when Dev refuses to participate, Cosmo and Wanda call on the Pe-Az, a trio of alien diplomats, to reason with him. Despite their best efforts, Dev outsmarts the Pe-Az and uses their alien technology to get rid of all the pizza on Earth. // Hazel must take matters into her own hands to get to the bottom of Devs surly attitude and save pizza! When Hazel makes a wish to understand why Dev acts the way he does, she gets paired with him for a class scavenger hunt. They struggle to work together, but, as the day goes on, they develop a friendship. However, that falls apart when Devs dad, Dale, belittles their effort, causing Dev to turn on Hazel again to save face. Will Dev be able to overcome his pride and finish the project, or will his issues with his dad tank both their grades?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Antics on Ice: Privates in heaven - icy, freezing heaven. The Lunacorns on Ice extravaganza is in town, and Skippers determined to take him as a treat. Accompanied by unexpected fellow fanboys Bing and Roy, the gang heads to the arena. Things get a bit d-icey when the gorilla and rhino end up on the ice with the lunacorns. The enraged director is ready to shutter the whole thing unless they find some way to slip n slide out of it. Showdown on Fairway 18:A legendary putter is at the center of controversy when the Amarillo Kid returns to the zoo. The slippery armadillo needs Privates help to make good on an ill-advised bet with two gopher brothers. Whos the bad guy here though? The gophers show up at the zoo to actually warn the penguins about the kid! The story takes us on more twists and turns than a Pebble Beach golf hole!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: King Me/Private and the Winky Factory King Me: King Juliens archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown. This time the sneaky lemur has a document that "proves" King Julien is not the legitimate king because he wasnt born in Madagascar. A series of challenges to prove whos more kingly ensues, and the penguins try to stack the deck in Juliens favor by each switching brains with him. Simple, right? How could a plan like this possibly fail? Private and the Winky Factory: Privates favorite treat, the Peanut Butter Winky, is going the way of the dinosaur. Distraught that the snack cake is ceasing production, Private urges a raid on the Winky Factory where the last remaining Winkies are rolling off the production line. Impressed by Privates passion, Skipper gives him command of the mission! The young penguin learns theres a heck of a lot to digest when leading a team. programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Not your average bunch of teenagers, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles have been expertly trained by their anthropomorphic rat sensei, Splinter, in the art of ninjutsu. Criminals of New York beware, beneath the streets of this concrete metropolis, Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello and Raphael are waiting to put their training into practice, battling evil forces within the city and restoring peace. From petty thieves, to evil overlords, to aliens of an unfamiliar kind, New York is safe in the hands of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles!

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig
programme.desc: This animated comedy show follows the outrageous and often gross-out antics of a enthusiastic and curious 12-year-old boy named Sanjay Patel and his best friend and a master of disguise, a talking snake named Craig. These two are match made in heaven as they find themselves in crazy and hilarious situations every day in their home town of Lundgren. They complete each other and together they are ready to face any challenges and difficulties that life has ahead for them.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: Панянка-селянка
programme.desc: По замыслу организаторов шоу в каждом выпуске примут участие 2 девушки: одна холеная и не бедная горожанка, а вторая - простая деревенская девчонка. Одна из них имеет спокойную работу в теплом уютном офисе, зарабатывает неплохие деньги, постоянно следит за своей внешностью и имиджем, все выходные проводит занимаясь шоппингом в крупных торгово-развлекательных центрах или развлекается с подругами в суши-барах, боулинг-клубах или кинотеатрах. Вторая участница - ведет полностью противоположный образ жизни: кормит домашнюю скотину, помогает родителям в огороде, одевается проще некуда, а зарабатывает, в лучшем случае, 1000 грн в сельском гастрономе. И вот такие две абсолютно непохожие девушки из разных миров на целых три дня поменяются местами и жизнями! Именно это и есть цель нового шоу Панянка-Селянка.

programme.title: Свадьба вслепую
programme.desc: Право быть счастливым имеет каждый. Но не каждый может осуществить его. "Свадьба вслепую" - это уникальный украинский социальный проект, который поможет разбитым сердцам создать новую крепкую семью. Однако его создатели сразу предупреждают о том, что даже у самой идеальной пары на проекте не всегда гарантирован успех в развитии отношений друг с другом.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Юмористическое скетч-шоу "На троих" - это зажигательные шутки и забавные истории, которые подсказывает сама жизнь. Персонажи "На троих" хорошо знакомы зрителям - это обычные врачи, гаишники, полицейские, офисный "планктон". Новые серии и десятки комических историй - в проекте "На троих" от актеров "Дизель Шоу"!

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. programme.title: Ментовские войны. Харьков
programme.desc: Продолжение культового сериала на телеканале 2+2 онлайн. Все фанаты криминальных историй смогут увидеть, как будет разворачиваться сюжет в новом городе, с новыми людьми и преступлениями, которые придется раскрывать умным следователем. Особенно трудно им будут даваться дела, в которых замешаны "оборотни в погонах" - сотрудники структур, которые должны защищать граждан, а не наоборот. Телеканал 2+2 онлайн гарантирует, что новый сериал понравится вам еще больше двух предыдущие проекты, действия которых разворачивались в Одессе и Киеве. К тому же, вы сможете испытать свои силы в решение запутанных дел - вдруг, вы поймете, кто именно является преступником, раньше, чем главные герои сериала? Смотрите 2+2 онлайн, и узнайте все первыми!

programme.title: Экстрасенсы-детективы
programme.desc: Международная команда экстрасенсов берется за расследование! Когда нет ни одной зацепки, когда полиция бессильна, им удается распутать самые громкие дела. Чтобы вычислить убийцу, им не нужны доказательства и свидетели. Они приходят на помощь, когда уже нет надежды узнать правду. Экстрасенсы направят свои способности на помощь простым людям. Тем, чьи родные или знакомые погибли при загадочных обстоятельствах. В расследованиях принимают участие экстрасенсы из разных стран мира: Великобритании, Эстонии, Чехии, Украины, Белоруссии, России, Австралии, США, Азербайджана, Болгарии, Грузии. В каждом выпуске программы они не соревнуются, а помогают друг другу. Параллельно с парой экстрасенсов расследование ведет профессиональный криминалист. Вместе они найдут виновных и восстановят справедливость!

Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: СуперЖена
programme.desc: Беспрецедентный баттл за титул суперженщины начинается! Каждую неделю 4 обаятельные и привлекательные девушки будут выяснять, кто же из них достоин звания лучшей жены. С понедельника по четверг дамы будут приходить друг к другу в гости, чтобы оценить хозяйственность, саморазвитие и сексуальность конкуренток. Сжульничать и выставить желаемое за действительное им не удастся, ведь за ними будет наблюдать опытный психолог. В пятницу он проведет беседы тет-а-тет и соберет девушек вместе, чтобы расставить все точки над "i".Хитрые манипуляторши, ведические жены, роковые соблазнительницы, яжматери и боевые подруги… Каждая женщина убеждена, что именно ее модель поведения самая правильная. Но кто же из них может покорить не только сердце своего мужчины, но и впечатлить конкуренток?

programme.title: Дизель-шоу
programme.desc: Каждый выпуск "Дизель-шоу" - это час настоящего народного юмора в исполнении блестящих резидентов шоу. Среди участников "Дизель-шоу" талантливые актеры, известные КВНщики и самобытные шоумены. Вся команда, бесспорно, прекрасно чувствует друг друга, а потому так легко и непринужденно дарит хорошее настроение своим зрителям. Концерты Дизель-шоу давно уже стали желанным событием в каждом городе Украины, а поэтому билеты на такие мероприятия раскупаются мгновенно. Поэтому лучше купить билеты заранее.

programme.title: Реальный секс с Юлией Гайворонской
programme.desc: Секс — это единение с любимым человеком и найвысшее наслаждение. Это искусство получать удовольствие, зная своё тело и понимая, что может нравится партнёру. Секс-эксперт Юлия Гайворонская и "Реальный Секс" поможет разобраться вам в тонкостях и многообразии сексуальных игр, развенчает мифы вокруг многих тем и поможет вашему желанию воплотиться в реальность.

Особенно трудно им будут даваться дела, в которых замешаны "оборотни в погонах" - сотрудники структур, которые должны защищать граждан, а не наоборот. Телеканал 2+2 онлайн гарантирует, что новый сериал понравится вам еще больше двух предыдущие проекты, действия которых разворачивались в Одессе и Киеве. К тому же, вы сможете испытать свои силы в решение запутанных дел - вдруг, вы поймете, кто именно является преступником, раньше, чем главные герои сериала? Смотрите 2+2 онлайн, и узнайте все первыми!

programme.title: Экстрасенсы-детективы
programme.desc: Международная команда экстрасенсов берется за расследование! Когда нет ни одной зацепки, когда полиция бессильна, им удается распутать самые громкие дела. Чтобы вычислить убийцу, им не нужны доказательства и свидетели. Они приходят на помощь, когда уже нет надежды узнать правду. Экстрасенсы направят свои способности на помощь простым людям. Тем, чьи родные или знакомые погибли при загадочных обстоятельствах. В расследованиях принимают участие экстрасенсы из разных стран мира: Великобритании, Эстонии, Чехии, Украины, Белоруссии, России, Австралии, США, Азербайджана, Болгарии, Грузии. В каждом выпуске программы они не соревнуются, а помогают друг другу. Параллельно с парой экстрасенсов расследование ведет профессиональный криминалист. Вместе они найдут виновных и восстановят справедливость!

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: СуперЖена
programme.desc: Беспрецедентный баттл за титул суперженщины начинается! Каждую неделю 4 обаятельные и привлекательные девушки будут выяснять, кто же из них достоин звания лучшей жены. С понедельника по четверг дамы будут приходить друг к другу в гости, чтобы оценить хозяйственность, саморазвитие и сексуальность конкуренток. Сжульничать и выставить желаемое за действительное им не удастся, ведь за ними будет наблюдать опытный психолог. В пятницу он проведет беседы тет-а-тет и соберет девушек вместе, чтобы расставить все точки над "i".Хитрые манипуляторши, ведические жены, роковые соблазнительницы, яжматери и боевые подруги… Каждая женщина убеждена, что именно ее модель поведения самая правильная. Но кто же из них может покорить не только сердце своего мужчины, но и впечатлить конкуренток?

programme.title: Дизель-шоу
programme.desc: Каждый выпуск "Дизель-шоу" - это час настоящего народного юмора в исполнении блестящих резидентов шоу. Среди участников "Дизель-шоу" талантливые актеры, известные КВНщики и самобытные шоумены. Вся команда, бесспорно, прекрасно чувствует друг друга, а потому так легко и непринужденно дарит хорошее настроение своим зрителям. Концерты Дизель-шоу давно уже стали желанным событием в каждом городе Украины, а поэтому билеты на такие мероприятия раскупаются мгновенно. Поэтому лучше купить билеты заранее.

programme.title: Реальный секс с Юлией Гайворонской
programme.desc: Секс — это единение с любимым человеком и найвысшее наслаждение. Это искусство получать удовольствие, зная своё тело и понимая, что может нравится партнёру. Секс-эксперт Юлия Гайворонская и "Реальный Секс" поможет разобраться вам в тонкостях и многообразии сексуальных игр, развенчает мифы вокруг многих тем и поможет вашему желанию воплотиться в реальность.

programme.title: Панянка-селянка
programme.desc: По замыслу организаторов шоу в каждом выпуске примут участие 2 девушки: одна холеная и не бедная горожанка, а вторая - простая деревенская девчонка. Одна из них имеет спокойную работу в теплом уютном офисе, зарабатывает неплохие деньги, постоянно следит за своей внешностью и имиджем, все выходные проводит занимаясь шоппингом в крупных торгово-развлекательных центрах или развлекается с подругами в суши-барах, боулинг-клубах или кинотеатрах. Вторая участница - ведет полностью противоположный образ жизни: кормит домашнюю скотину, помогает родителям в огороде, одевается проще некуда, а зарабатывает, в лучшем случае, 1000 грн в сельском гастрономе. И вот такие две абсолютно непохожие девушки из разных миров на целых три дня поменяются местами и жизнями! Именно это и есть цель нового шоу Панянка-Селянка.

programme.title: Mans RIFS
programme.desc: Čārlijs dzimis Panamā, mūzikā jau kopš bērnības — koris, talantīgi draugi un krāsaina, muzikāla sabiedrība. Ģitāru viņš paņēma rokās tikai pirms piecpadsmit gadiem, kad sieva uzdāvināja pirmo instrumentu un teica: "Tu esi mūziķis." Mūzikā viņš meklē patiesumu, nevis virtuozitāti. "Man ģitāra ļauj izteikties," viņš saka. Mūzika viņam ir rituāls — brīdis, kas savieno. Šodien Čārlijs rada ambientu un meditatīvu mūziku un tic, ka viss apkārt var iedvesmot.

programme.title: Mēs varam - mēs darām!

programme.title: Tikšanās vieta. Valmieras novads
programme.desc: Vēlies uzzināt kas notiek Valmieras novadā? Šis ir raidījums, kurā par to vari uzzināt visu. Aktualitātes, jaunumi un notikumi.

programme.title: Ceļot bez robežām
programme.desc: Ceļot bez robežām komanda no Stambulas dodas uz Šrilanku, bet pa ceļam vēl uzspēj apskatīt Dubaiju un izbraukt 2 stundu braucienā ar taksi pa galvenajām apskates vietām. Bet ielidojat Šrilankā, komandu sagaida tūrisma centra lielā komanda, piešķir komandai gidu, šoferi ar busu un nogādā pirmajā viesnīcā, pašā okeāna krastā. Otrajā dienā, jau no paša rīta brauc skatīties kā mazgā ziloņus, apskata vairāk kā 2000 gadu vecu templi un pēcpusdienā dodas uz safari, apskatīt savvaļas ziloņus.

programme.title: Māksla dzīvot
programme.desc: Šonedēļ raidījumā "Māksla dzīvot" — saruna par veselību, skaistumu un dzīves kvalitāti, skatot to no divām dažādām, bet aizraujošam perspektīvām. Sarunā ar ārsti dermatoloģi Lindu Kapteini-Veitu skaidrosim: kā mūsu āda atspoguļo gan veselību, gan emocionālo stāvokli? Uzzināsim, kā rūpēties par ādu, lai tā būtu vesela un spīdētu, un kā dermatoloģija spēj palīdzēt saglabāt gan ārējo, gan iekšējo līdzsvaru? Labākas dzirdes rubrikā skaidrosim visu par dzirdes diagnostikas veidiem un iespējām, ko sniedz mūsdienu tehnoloģijas. Bet aizraujošā sarunā par skaņas dizainu iztaujāsim aktrisi, komponisti un skaņas dizaineri Zani Dombrovsku. Uzzināsim, kas ir skaņas dizains un kā to var izmantot, lai radītu mieru, koncentrēšanos vai iedvesmu. Tas būs stāsts par līdzsvaru, skaistumu un apzinātību — par to, kā mazās ikdienas detaļas ietekmē mūsu dzīvi un labsajūtu.

programme.title: Vislatvijas balva "Latvijas Gada skolotājs"
programme.desc: Pirmo reizi 11 individuālās un divās komandu nominācijās tiks pasniegta balva "Latvijas Gada skolotājs". Tās mērķis ir godināt talantīgus pedagogus no visas valsts, apliecinot skolotāja darba izšķirošo nozīmi Latvijas sabiedrības un valsts attīstībai.

programme.title: Koncertuzvedums "MĀLS"
programme.desc: Koncertuzvedumā "MĀLS" dziesma, deja, amatniecība un rūpniecība saplūst vienotā stāstā par māla ceļu no zemes dzīlēm līdz zvaigznēm. Tas ir stāsts par māla dabu un klātbūtni cilvēka dzīvē. Par tā daudzveidību, mainību un pielietojumu. Stāsta, ka Dievs radījis cilvēku no māla pikas. Cilvēks māla krāsnī cepis maizi, dzēris ūdens malku no māla krūzes un sildījies pie māla podiņu krāsns. Pa māla klonu gājis, cēlis māju no ķieģeļiem, kā arī, licis jumtu no māla dakstiņiem. Māls - no zemes dzīlēm nācis, līdz debesīm kāpis. Koncertuzvedums "MĀLS" tapa kā "Cēsis - Latvijas kultūras galvaspilsēta 2025" īpašais notikums, tā stāstu šovasar Cēsu Pils parka estrādē izdzīvoja 2000 dalībnieki, mūzikas grupas "Auļi" un "Latvian Voices".

programme.title: Skats no Ventspils. Notikumi. Cilvēki. Viedokļi
programme.desc: Raidījums par notikumiem Ventspilī.

programme.title: Dzīves ceļojums
programme.desc: Dokumentālo stāstu cikls "Dzīves ceļojums" - jau drīzumā sērija par arhibīskapu Jāni Vanagu. Viņa dzīves ceļš ir ticības un kalpošanas stāsts. No jaunības meklējumiem līdz garīgai vadībai, kas iedvesmo tūkstošus. Par sirdsapziņu, spēku un klusuma brīžiem, kuros dzimst atbildes. Jau 11. novembrī, plkst. 21.30 kanālā ReTV. "Dzīves ceļojums" — patiesi stāsti par cilvēkiem, kuri maina pasauli sev apkārt.

programme.title: Ceļot bez robežām
programme.desc: Trešā diena Šrilankā sākas ar agru celšanos un došanos uz Sigrijas kalnu, kur jāpārvar daudzi pakāpieni, lai sasniegtu virsotni un izbaudītu saullēktu. Pēc brokastīm viesnīcā, komandai šodien lauku tūrisms - brauciens ar vērsi, ar motorbloku, ar laivu un ēdiena gatavošana zemnieku stilā. Bet vakarā bauda masāžu un Šrilankas dejas. Nākamajā dienā komanda apskata dārzu ar dažādiem eksotiskiem augiem, dārgakmeņu muzeju un vakarā dodas uz templi apskatīt budas zobu.

programme.title: Meža veča emuāri
programme.desc: Par godu Valts svētkiem Māris Olte raidījumā "Meža Veča Emuāri" dosies mežā, lai kopā ar kritušo karavīru meklēšanas vienības "Leģenda" vadītāju Tāli Ešmitu atgrieztu kādās mājās mieru. Atklāsim kā notiek karā kritušo meklēšana un pārapbedīšana. Citējot Māri Olti: "Kamēr mēs dzīvosim, tikmēr mēs meklēsim - ko kurš meklē, tas ir dzīves galvenais jautājums!"

programme.title: Nedēļa Latvijā
programme.desc: Par aizvadītās nedēļas svarīgākajiem notikumiem Latvijas novados.

programme.title: Galaktika. Mums pieder tik daudz
programme.desc: Populārā šlāgermūzikas grupa "Galaktika" 2024.gada 14.februārī Latgales vēstniecībā GORS prezentēja albumu "Mums pieder tik daudz". Grupā "Galaktika" apvienojušies divi talantīgi mūziķi - Normunds Zušs un Vitolds Gorņevs. Normunds Zušs ir mūzikas skolotājs, vadījis vairākus korus. Nu jau vairākus gadus Normunda balss skan arī "Latvijas Radio 2" ēterā, viņš vada arī populāro raidījumu "Latvijas sirdsdziesma".

programme.title: Tā dzīvojam
programme.desc: Ērmaņu muižas īpašnieks, komponists Uģis Prauliņš (2020.gada arhīvs)

programme.desc: Konkūrists Kristaps Neretnieks (2020.gada arhīvs)

programme.title: Rezervēts
programme.desc: Elīza Legzdiņa. Viņa 13 gados vecākiem lūdza - sūtiet mani uz Londonu mācīties. Situsies pa dzīvi šaurībā un gadījuma darbos ar vienu mēŗki - kļūt par dziedātāju. Viņa nokāpa no lielās operas skatuves ar diplomu, lai kļūtu par vienu košākajām hiphopa māksliniecēm Eiropā. Enerģiska, tieša, izaicinoša un latviete, kura šogad kāpusi uz Glastonberijas skatuves. Bez producenta, kompānijām un mārketinga komandas. Visu sasniegusi pati - ar sviedriem, asarām, depresiju un spārniem. Viņa ir populārākā Spotify dziedātāja no Latvijas. Rezervēts. Elīza Legzdiņa.

programme.title: Copes Frekvence
programme.desc: Raidījums par makšķerēšanu un makšķerēšanus sportu.

programme.title: Meža veča emuāri
programme.desc: Māris Olte dosies uz Salacas pusi, lai skaidrotu visu par projekts "Life is Salaca" - kas tas ir, kā tas izsāktās dabā un kā tas radies? Tāpat skaidrosim, ko varam darīt jau šodien, lai palīdzētu tīrākai nākotnei! Un uzzināism vai ir iespējams ar NVO izveidot miljonus piesaistošus projektus?

programme.title: Vīri kā ozoli
programme.desc: Šoreiz raidījumā "Vīri kā ozoli" viesosimies Kuldīgā, lai tiktos ar trīs kurzemniekiem, kas paguvuši uzstādīt vairākus Latvijas rekordus. Runāsim par mērķiem, sapņiem un cerībām, un ielūkosimies, kā atpūšas spēkavīri.

programme.title: Manas jaunās mājas Latgale
programme.desc: Pirms 12 gadiem daugavpiliete Kristīne Lipkova kopā ar ģimeni pārcēlās uz Angliju. Turp viņus aizveda vajadzība sakārtot savu finanisālo stāvokli pēc ģimenes uzņēmuma darbības pārtraukšanas, nodokļu reformas rezultātā. Jau divus gadus, kopā ar jaunāko meitu, Kristīne ir atgriezusies Latvijā. Kā viņa iejutusies Līvānos, kādēļ pieņēmusi lēmumu atgriezties un kā reemigrācijas situāciju raksturo nozares speciālisti?

programme.title: Ceļā uz mājām
programme.desc: Jaunākajā epizodē Lauris Zalāns un Madara Kivkucāne dodas ciemos pie kādas jaunas ģimenes Piņķos, kuriem apnikusi sava flīžu krāsa vannasistabā. Radīsim kā nokrāsot flīzes pašu spēkiem, kas nepieciešams un cik tas izmaksā.

programme.title: Latvijas valsts ideja un aizsardzība: no dibināšanas līdz mūsdienām
programme.desc: Cikla noslēdzošajā raidījumā par pilsonisko pienākumu aizstāvēt savu valsti Vidzemes Augstskolas (ViA) vadošais pētnieks Gatis Krūmiņš diskutēs ar ViA asociēto profesori un Latvijas Nacionālās aizsardzības akadēmijas vadošo pētnieci Ievu Bērziņu, kā arī ar zemessardzi Solveigu Leitlandi un jaunsardzi Ievu Elizabeti Bicani.

programme.title: Mēs varam - mēs darām!
programme.desc: Televeikala skatlogs. Iedvesmojies kā hobiju pārvērst par pelnītspējīgu biznesu. Uzzini, kas tuvākā un tālākā apkārtnē atjaunots, uzlabots un pilveidots. Seko līdz, stāstiem ar kuriem varam lepoties un iespējām, kas var būt aktuālas tieši Tev!

programme.title: Pa priecīgā kartupeļa pēdām
programme.desc: Gundars Bojārs un Gvido Kakliauskas dodas vairāk nekā 20 dienu garā ceļojumā kalnos, lai atrastu dažādos kartupeļus.

programme.title: Gaidām ciemos!
programme.desc: "Gaidām ciemos!" ir par dažādu valstu kultūru, vēsturi un tradīcijām. Raidījuma vadītājs Zurabs Dvaļi ceļo un aicina skatītājus kopā ar viņu pastaigāties pa skaistām vietām, novērtēt apskates vietas, apbrīnot dabu un satikt interesantus cilvēkus. Skatītāji vispirms uzzinās interesantus vēstures faktus par dažādu valstu slavenākajiem vai aizmirstākajiem reģioniem, bet pēc tam izzinās kulinārijas tradīcijas, kopā ar raidījuma viesiem gatavojot vairākus ēdienus.

programme.title: Zaļā gaisma
programme.desc: Auto, drošība uz ceļa, jaunāko noteikumu un likumu skaidrojumi. Raidījumā pastāstīsim par jaunākajām aktualitātēm, kas jāzina un jāņem vērā katram autovadītājam.

programme.title: Veselības kompass
programme.desc: Raidījums stāstīs par dažādiem ar veselību saistītiem jautājumiem, sniegs padomus un vedīs tevi ceļā uz veselīgāku dzīvesveidu, labāku pašsajūtu un priecīgāku ikdienu! Katru nedēļu uz sarunu aicināsim dažādus jomas ekspertus un kopā gan sportosim, gan apspriedīsim dažādas ar veselību saistītas tēmas, gan arī izmēģināsim daudz kā jauna un mūsu veselībai noderīga!

programme.title: Galaktika. Mums pieder tik daudz
programme.desc: Populārā šlāgermūzikas grupa "Galaktika" 2024.gada 14.februārī Latgales vēstniecībā GORS prezentēja albumu "Mums pieder tik daudz". Grupā "Galaktika" apvienojušies divi talantīgi mūziķi - Normunds Zušs un Vitolds Gorņevs. Normunds Zušs ir mūzikas skolotājs, vadījis vairākus korus. Nu jau vairākus gadus Normunda balss skan arī "Latvijas Radio 2" ēterā, viņš vada arī populāro raidījumu "Latvijas sirdsdziesma".

programme.title: Vidzemes Augstskolas studentu īsfilmu izlase
programme.desc: Katru gadu Vidzemes Augstskolas studenti sper pirmos soļus kino pasaulē, veidojot īsfilmas par tēmām, kas viņiem šķiet svarīgas un aktuālas. Šie stāsti ir daudzveidīgi - gan pēc satura, gan izpildījuma, taču katrs no tiem nes sevī vērtīgu vēstījumu un emocijas, kas neatstās vienaldzīgu nevienu skatītāju.

programme.title: Mans RIFS
programme.desc: Šajā epizodē ģitārists Didzis Kikusts dalās ar saviem pirmajiem soļiem mūzikā. Viņš atceras bērnības iespaidus, ceļu no disko melodijām un saksofona spēles līdz brīdim, kad ģitāra kļuva par viņa galveno izteiksmes veidu. Stāstā atklājas gan muzikālās ietekmes, gan personīgās pieredzes, kas veidojušas viņa radošo pasauli.

programme.title: Tikšanās vieta. Valmieras novads
programme.desc: Vēlies uzzināt kas notiek Valmieras novadā? Šis ir raidījums, kurā par to vari uzzināt visu. Aktualitātes, jaunumi un notikumi.

programme.title: Izstāsti Latvijai
programme.desc: Raidījums, kurā par sabiedrībā aktuālajām tēmām runās nozares eksperti un viedokļu līderi, savus veiksmes stāstus stāstīs uzņēmēji un tiks testēti produkti.

programme.title: Nedēļa Jēkabpilī
programme.desc: Jēkabpils aktualitātes šonedēļ.

programme.title: Runā Latgale
programme.desc: Ziņu raidījums.

programme.title: Limbažu novads rada un dara
programme.desc: Par aktualitātēm Limbažu novadā.

programme.title: Nedēļa Latvijā
programme.desc: Par aizvadītās nedēļas svarīgākajiem notikumiem Latvijas novados.

programme.title: Tiksimies stacijā!
programme.desc: Kad Vācijas armija Pirmā pasaules kara laikā bija okupējusi lielu daļu Kurzemes, tā izveidoja 600 mm sliežu platuma dzelzceļu tīklu. Atzaru no Cīruļiem uz Roju izmantoja gan militārās aizsardzības mērķiem, piemēram, uz Roju nogādājot lielgabalus krasta aizsardzībai, gan saimnieciskām vajadzībām. Vēlāk te sāka kursēt arī pasažieru bānītis. Posms no Cīruļiem līdz Popvālei šai atzarā pastāvēja vien 15 gadus. Tikpat garš mūžs bija atvēlēts Ārlavas stacijai. Tā šobrīd atdzimusi citā veidolā. Lubes un Rojas stacijas pastāvēja līdz 1960. gadu sākumam. Pirmajā darbības gadā Lubes staciju izmantoja ap 400 pasažieru, savukārt Rojā stacija pat bijusi divās dažādās vietās. Kādēļ tā un kā šobrīd dzīvo staciju ēkas, stāstīsim raidījumā "Tiksimies stacijā!".

programme.title: Manas bērnības atmiņas
programme.desc: Bieži vien mēs par sabiedrībā pazīstamiem cilvēkiem zinām gana daudz - radošo dzīvi, panākumus, arī privātās dzīves aizkulises, taču šo raidījumu sērija ļaus mums iepazīt personību stāstus par ģimeni, rotaļlietām, bērnības draugiem, skolas gaitām un pirmajām mīlestībām. Otrais raidījums par Inesi Kučinsku.

programme.title: Ceļot bez robežām
programme.desc: Šajā sērijā "Ceļot bez robežām" komanda viesoies tējas rūpnīcā, kas viņus iedvesmos arī pavisam neparastai nakšņošanas vietas izvēlei. Bet turpinot piedzīvojumus tiks apskatīta Ella, jeb viens no skaistākajiem Šrilnakas tūrimsa objektiem - vilciena ceļš, no kura paveras aizraujošas ainavas - zaļās tējas plantācijas, kalni un gleznaini skati.

programme.title: Copes lietas
programme.desc: Divu azartisku makšķernieku piedzīvojumi Latvijas un citu zemju ūdeņos. Iepazīsimies ar visiem makšķerēšanas veidiem - no pludiņa līdz pat mušai, ieskatoties gan pašā makšķerēšanas procesā, gan arī katra makšķerēšanas stila inventāra apguvē.

programme.title: Krēsls Nr.3372
programme.desc: Lantes muižas dokumentālā cikla "Atdzimšanas stāsti" sērija "Krēsls Nr.3372" ir detektīva cienīgs stāsts par krēslu, ko skicējis arhitekts Eižens Laube — viens no ievērojamākajiem 20. gadsimta latviešu arhitektiem, kuram šogad atzīmējam 145. dzimšanas dienu. Savas karjeras sākumā viņš veidoja ēkas jūgendstila nacionālā romantisma virzienā, bet vēlāk, laikmeta tendencēm mainoties, pievērsās neoklasicisma arhitektūrai. Krēsla ceļš, ko viņš radījis, sākas Saeimas parlamenta ēkā un ved līdz Rēzeknes novadam, šķērsojot liktenīgus Latvijas vēstures notikumus pagājušajā gadsimtā. Pēc rūpīgas restaurācijas Aigara Pilenieka darbnīcā, šis krēsls atdzimst un iegūst jaunu mājvietu Lantes muižas Zaļajā istabā, kļūstot par dzīvu Latvijas kultūras un amatniecības mantojuma simbolu. Filmā atklājas restaurētā krēsla saikne ar izcilām Latvijas personībām — cilvēkiem, kuru ideāli un darbi iemiesoja Latvijas valstiskuma pirmsākumus. Lantes muižas dokumentālā cikla "Atdzimšanas stāsti" filma ir aizraujošs ceļojums Latvijas kultūras un vēstures labirintos, piepildīts spilgtām laikmeta liecībām un atgādinājums par Latvijas un Eiropas kopīgā mantojuma nozīmi šodienas pasaulē. Lantes muižā jūtama vēstures elpa — šis leģendām apvītais mantojums Ropažu pusē piedzīvo otro dzīvi, kļūstot par vietu, kur pagātne un tagadne satiekas, lai stāstītu par Latvijas garīgo spēku un atdzimšanu.
